channel.title: Web Design on Tiffany Lo
channel.description: Recent content in Web Design on Tiffany Lo

item.title: Gen Bakes website
item.description: Background After operating Gen Bakes by word-of-mouth and her Instagram page, Gen needed a more accessible place to direct prospective clients looking to order baked goods or get details for her next pop-up event. Approach Everything on the site is led by photography first, with bold typography that conveys Gen’s personable and exuberant voice popping out against a minimalist color-blocked layout. Then there’s illustrations, frosting squiggles, and stickers sprinkled throughout to soften the simple palette as well.
